definitions.name: hangup_call
definitions.description:
Terminate the current Twilio call.
        
        Use this function when:
        - The conversation has reached a natural conclusion and you are saying goodbye
        - The customer explicitly asks to end the call
        - All customer needs have been addressed and the call should be terminated
   You decide the call is finished. 
 if the customer asks for the call to be hung_up, cancelled, closed, terminated or any other similiar term, then you should call this function.

definitions.name: transfer_call
definitions.description:
Transfer the current call to another phone number or department.
        
        Use this function when:
        - The customer needs to speak with a human agent
        - The customer's issue requires specialized assistance
        - The customer explicitly requests to speak with a representative
        - The issue is too complex for the AI to handle
        
        This will connect the customer to the specified department or phone number.

definitions.name: validate_aba
definitions.description:
Validate a bank routing number (ABA number).
        
        Use this function when:
        - A customer wants to set up bank payments
        - You need to verify a routing number
        - Before processing any ACH/bank payments
        
        The function will return the bank name if the routing number is valid.

aba.description: Exactly 9-digit bank ABA routing number explicitly provided by the customer.

definitions.name: make_payment
definitions.description:
Submit a payment for a loan using bank account information.

Use this function when a caller wants to make a payment

This function will submit the payment to the middleware service and return a confirmation code or error message.
The payment will be processed immediately using the provided bank account information.

request_key.description: Request key from previous loan lookup call

aba.description: Customer's Bank routing number called aba

default.description: 'true' to set as default payment account, 'false' otherwise

nickname.description: Optional nickname for the account that might come from the loan_details lookup

name_on_account.description: Customer's Name as it appears on the bank account

account_business.description: 'true' for business account if account_business =1 , 'false' for personal account if account_business = 0

save_pay_account.description: 'true' to save account for future payments, 'false' otherwise

payment_data.description: Payment details including amount and account information

definitions.name: switch_agent
definitions.description:
Switch control to a specialized agent with a different prompt and capabilities.

Use this function when:
- The current task is complete and another specialized agent should take over
- The caller is delinquent and payment rules differ
- The caller wants to use a new bank account
- The conversation flow requires changing tone, scope, or tooling

Available agents include:
- 'payment_basic': standard payments for current accounts
- 'payment_delinquent': delinquency-specific rules and empathy phrasing
- 'payment_new_ach': new bank info capture and validation
- 'escalation': CSR transfer handling for unsupported or sensitive requests

Always use this function to change persona, prompt, or functional tools mid-call.

target_agent.description: The name of the agent to switch to. Valid values: 'payment_basic', 'payment_delinquent', 'payment_new_ach', 'escalation'
